SELECT id, parent_id, name, sort, is_show FROM pms_category WHERE is_deleted = 0
AND name LIKE CONCAT( #{filter.name} , '%' )
ORDER BY sort ASC, create_time DESC

SELECT c.id, c.name FROM pms_category c JOIN pms_category_spu_relation csr ON ( c.id = csr.category_id AND csr.is_deleted = 0 AND c.is_deleted = 0 ) WHERE c.is_show = 1
AND c.name LIKE CONCAT( #{filter.name} , '%' )
GROUP BY c.id ORDER BY c.sort ASC, c.create_time DESC
